name: Figma Measure
description:
A plugin for easy measurement of sizes. The simple user interface allows you to add easily redlines for heights and widths, fill spaces, measure distances between elements and more.


How to use?

You can find this plugin in the "Plugins" section by right-clicking on your project.


Clicking "Figma Measure" opens a window.

Now you can select one or more elements and click on the different measurements to add lines.
